overview:
Waleed is founder and CEO of MySurfPad.com, a customizable start page. Since its launch in May of 2008, the site has seen tremendous growth in number of visits and users. Over 40% of users visit the site at least 5 times per day. This growth was due to unique viral marketing techniques that were employed.

Waleed was also founder and CEO of Advanced Visual Media Corporation based in Washington DC. A V Media Corp is a boutique web design and site optimization firm.
